titleStmt.title: The desire and advice of the Lords and Commons in Parliament to His Majesty that the next assize and generall goale-delivery may not be holden, &c. : vvith His Maiesties gratious answer thereunto : February 21, 1642.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: False imprint. The genuine Oxford edition reads "With His Maiesties" and has the words "His Maiesties" in romans instead of italics as in this edition.
Identifed on UMI film and in reel guide as E1522 (genuine imprint) rather than correct Wing number, E1522A, for false imprint.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
